Variant.Name: C9
Variant.Description: Standard C9 game with 2 Mafia, 0-1 Doctor, 0-1 Cop and 3-5 Vanilla Townies.

Variant.Name: PieC9
Variant.Description: Pie C9 game with 1 Mafia, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Doctor, 1 Cop and 3 Vanilla Townies.

Variant.Name: Vigilante
Variant.Description: A game for six people. One player is a vigilante who can choose to kill someone once during the game during the day, ending voting. One is a cop, one is mafia, and three are townies.
